description: Product of exponents of prime factorization of n by prime signature: A005361(A025487).
links: √Ålvar Ibeas, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (PARI) lista() = {v = readvec("b025487.txt"); for (i=1, #v, f = factor(v[i]); print1(prod(k=1, #f~, f[k,2]), ", "););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Nov 02 2014
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Nov 15 1999
